includeSubtasks.description: Use this parameter only when you are searching for issues using taskKey. This means that when the includeSubtasks parameter is present in the request payload, you need to ensure that the taskKey parameter is also provided in the request in order to get correct results. Otherwise, the value of the includeSubtasks parameter in the payload has no effect and we will return worklogs that belong to both parent and subtasks within the given dates.

StaticListValue.description: Static List Values.  Omit if work attribute is not a STATIC_LIST

info.description: Welcome to Tempo Timesheets API Documentation. Use this REST API to programmatically transfer data to or from Tempo Core in order to integrate with other business components. REST being based on open standards, you are free to use any web development language to access the API.
info.title: Tempo Timesheets

parameters.description: first day of the period. Defaults to today

parameters.description: number of periods to query, counting backwards from today's period
parameters.name: numberOfPeriods

put.description: Update information on an already existing worklog. Please note that it is not possible to update the worker or originTaskId, In order to do so, you would have to delete the existing worklog and create a new one on the chosen worker/originTaskId.

requestBody.description: Add key-value pairs of the fields you're changing
